newest.message:
# Release v4.0.20
## New Features - Skill injector requirements in the Skill Planner now include an estimate of the cost in the tooltip text
## Bug Fixes - Manual workaround for missing skill information on new Fleet skills from SDE - Fix a potential race condition in asset lookup - Greatly improve speed of asset price lookups, and add Fuzzworks Market as an available provider
## Contributors - Peter Han - NevarrTivianne

release.message:
# EVEMon 4.1.1
# Features - Attempt to get the built-in updater working correctly
## Bug Fixes - Fixes an issue where the settings file fails to load correctly
